DemoApp.commandLineArgs: rootCA "Test Root CA" -ou OU1 -ou OU2 -o Org -c USA -fp C:/TestCerts/root.pfx -nb 05/17/2022 -na 05/17/2032 -rsa 4096
intermediateCA "Test Intermediate CA" "C:/TestCerts/root.pfx" -ou OU1 -ou OU2 -o Org -c USA -fp C:/TestCerts/intermediate.pfx -nb 8/25/2022 -na 8/25/2027 -rsa 4096

ssl "SSL Cert" "C:/TestCerts/intermediate.pfx" -dns test.mywebsite.com -dns *.mywebsite.com -ip 12.13.14.15 -ip 12.13.14.16 -ou OU1 -ou OU2 -o Org -c USA -pub C:/TestCerts/ssl-public.pfx -prv C:/TestCerts/ssl-private.pfx -nb 8/25/2022 -na 8/25/2023 -rsa 4096
